sentence.text: Somewhere in the back of his mind he registered that they were both calling to him , Hank and Ma together .
Even before she registered that there was no child , she saw his anger .

But we may well have seen them without registering that fact ; perhaps a film is set in a particular location and we are so involved in the plot that the background scenery enters only our subconscious mind .
Ten years later , the Imperium registered that Karkason had lapsed into heresy .
I register at once that this place is different somehow … then I tell myself I am imagining it .
Then she registered that there was a message stuck on her typewriter too and curiosity propelled her towards it .
It was quite still for the breeze had dropped and he vaguely registered that the women seemed to have gone .
When the phone rang Sam jolted awake but for two seconds did not register which phone was ringing .
Through the swing doors , and he had not registered what was happening to him until he was out into the late afternoon cold and the open doorway at the back of the car was yawning for him .
It took a moment or two before he registered who she was , then he said heavily , ` Good of you to look in like this , Ruth .
She looked out of the window but hardly seemed to register what she saw .
Yet , rounding the bend , her novelist 's imagination registered Cosmo striking Hubert violently in the face .
She registered the blood on the white telephone .
She registered his sardonic nod with dismay .
Getting back home to Armscott Manor was a mechanical necessity , but she hardly registered the journey .
